Comment: Good description of applying Core Values as participants in sports
Great division of roles - effective use of each other's strengths
The team notebook to capture progress toward goals shows good planning
The team was good about acknowledging ideas from every one
The use of rotating buddy pairs to do both robot and project work shows good Coopertition
We liked how you showed us your team meeting agenda including activities for all four aspects of the challenge

column4: Kids decide' reflects kids doing the work

Comment: Consider expressing how the team explored new skills and ideas
Consider expressing how the team used creativity and persistence to solve problems
Consider expressing how the team applied what they learned to improve their world
Consider expressing how the team demonstrated respect and embraced their differences
Consider expressing how the team clearly showed they had worked as a team throughout their journey
Consider expressing how the team clearly had fun and celebrated what they have achieved - as individuals and a group
We loved the way you talked to the expert about __ and then used their feedback to improve your ideas
Consider engaging additional experts in your research
